name: Squire (jerbaloot)
description:
Controls

Arrow keys - Movement

1 - Wave Flag (Attract knight)

2 - Cook Food

3 - Sharpen Blade

Description

I almost didn't do this jam. I couldn't think of any responses to the prompt that were interesting enough to me. I had thought that the prompt required you to be a villain, but it only says you are not The Hero. So I ended up making a game where you assist a hero.

This was the first time I tried 3d animations. My hope had been to emulate the dead cells appearance  (needs more lighting to get closer). Rather, it began looking like Donkey Kong Country. That's a great art style, but not what I wanted. I tried moving away from that style by scaling down the sprites.

I'll try getting into sound for my next game jam.

In conclusion

It's honestly in pretty rough shape at the moment. Thank you for taking the time to play my game! Any feedback would greatly appreciated!!!

Resources:

Medieval font for main menu - https://fonts.google.com/specimen/MedievalSharp?query=medieval

Balsamiq Sans for all other text - https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Balsamiq+Sans?query=balsami
